//O(N^2) algo
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
#define eps 1e-7
using namespace std;
inline double compute_slp(int x1,int y1,int x2,int y2)
{
	return (double)(y1-y2)/(double)(x1-x2);
}
main()
{
	int n,arr[701][2],t,maximum,countt,index;
	double slope[701];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>arr[i][0]>>arr[i][1];
		
		maximum=-1;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			index=0;
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
			{
				slope[index++]=compute_slp(arr[i][0],arr[i][1],arr[j][0],arr[j][1]);			
			}
			sort(slope,slope+index);
			countt=2;
			for(int j=0;j<index;j++)
			{
				if(abs(slope[j]-slope[j+1])<eps)
				countt++;
				else
				countt=2;
				maximum=max(countt,maximum);
			}
		}
		if(n==1)
		cout<<"1\n";
		else
		cout<<maximum<<"\n";
	} 
}
